nodes.text: A nutrient dispenser was used by the Yuuzhan Vong to feed the captives on the clustership Crèche. The dispenser had a thick, tapered spout which the captive would place his bowl under. The dispenser would then dispense the allotted amount of nutrient into the captives bowl. The food was the same for every meal and every captive regardless of species and, as the Yuuzhan Vong despised droids, was prepared in some way by creatures.
